repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Some marginal additions are seen. Numeration is not continues. Some one has written numbers in pencil in roman also. On front cover something is written in Telugu with ink pen.

msItem.title: Caturvargacintāmaṇi. Prāyaścittādhyāya
msItem.author: Hemādri

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 06 p: 319 VOHD II.8 p: 1071 entry number 3340

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 Vande haṃ vandanīyānāṃ ? hyāṃ vācāmadhīśvaraṃ . amitāśeṣakalyāṇakulināṃ kamalādayitaṃ kṛṣṇakaṃ kamalā 1v 2 sanavanditaṃ . kamalākṣamahaṃ vande kamalākaraśāyinaṃ . athedānīṃ hemādrikariṇā lokopakārākṣaṃ sarvapurāṇasmṛtisaṃhitāveda 1v 3 jyotiṣavaidyāgamaśrautasmārtasūtreṣu granthānālokya brahmakṣatriyaviśāṃ śudrādīnām brahmahatyāsamāni pāpāni vānyatamakā
msItem.explicit:
152r 1 pariṣadaṃgachcet prāyaścitta itarastu nityakarmāntaṃ kṛtvā doṣabuddhīṃ avācare . īti hemādriviracite dharmaśāstre prāyaścitta
152r 2 kāṇḍe aghamarṣaṇasnānavidhissamāptaṃ .

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration sometimes in left and sometimes in the right margin on the verso of the folio. Numeration is not continues. Some one has written numbers in pencil in roman also.

handNote.desc: As letters are incised only so shapes are faded up over the time. Rest readable and clean writing.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ , hemādri prayaścittam is written in the left margin on 1v.

listBibl.bibl: Caturvargacintāmaṇi of Hemādrī Vol IV Prāyaścittakāṇḍa, edi. By Paṇḍita Pramathanātha Tarkabhūṣaṇa, Chaukhamba Prakshana Varanasi Original Publication Asiatic Society Bengal 1911, reprinted by Chawkhamba Publication 1985.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
